com.jp.stocks.dao

Interface InstrumentDao<T extends Instrument>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    StockDaoImpl

    public interface InstrumentDao<T extends Instrument>
    This is persistence class for the given instrument. The implementors of these shall consider whether to store in filesystem, Database or keep them in memory. This can be extended to any type of financial instrument

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean deleteInstrument(T instrument)
      Delete a given instrument
      T getInstrument(String ticker)
      Find a instrument for given ticker
      List<T> getInstruments()
      Find all instruments
      boolean saveInstrument(T instrument)
      Persists a given instrument

    • Method Detail

      • saveInstrument

        boolean saveInstrument(T instrument)
                throws DaoException
        Persists a given instrument
        Parameters:
        instrument - Instrument to save, this can be stock, fx or any other financial instrument
        Returns:
        boolean if saved successfully
        Throws:
        DaoException - in case of any connection issues or cache issues (if it is stored in memory)

      • deleteInstrument

        boolean deleteInstrument(T instrument)
                  throws DaoException,
                         InstrumentNotFoundException
        Delete a given instrument
        Parameters:
        instrument - Instrument to delete, this can be stock, fx or any other financial instrument
        Returns:
        boolean if removed successfully
        Throws:
        DaoException - in case of any connection issues or cache issues (if it is stored in memory)
        InstrumentNotFoundException - if the given instrument is not found

      • getInstrument

        T getInstrument(String ticker)
         throws DaoException,
                InstrumentNotFoundException
        Find a instrument for given ticker
        Parameters:
        ticker - Instrument to find, this can be stock, fx or any other financial instrument
        Returns:
        T if found
        Throws:
        DaoException - in case of any connection issues or cache issues (if it is stored in memory)
        InstrumentNotFoundException - if the given instrument is not found

      • getInstruments

        List<T> getInstruments()
                throws DaoException,
                       InstrumentNotFoundException
        Find all instruments
        Returns:
        List if found
        Throws:
        DaoException - in case of any connection issues or cache issues (if it is stored in memory)
        InstrumentNotFoundException - if the given instrument is not found
